mapper.sql:
SELECT T.ORDERTYPE, T.CREATEON, T.RECEIVEAMOUNT, T.REMARK, T.MATERIALTYPENAME, T.ORGTYPE, T.PACKAGEFACTOR, T.ID, T.RECEIVEDIFFAMOUNT, T.BUYCOMPANYNAME, T.SERIESNAME, T.ACTUALTAXTOTALAMOUNT, T.DEPARTMENTNAME, T.CREATOR, T.PRODUCTCODE, T.ORDERREMARK, T.MORDERID, T.ORDERCODE, T.PRODUCTNUM, T.ORDERDATE, T.BRANDNAME, T.SALEAMOUNT, T.DISABLED, T.COMPANYNAME, T.PRODUCTNAME, T.BOXNUM, T.SALESMAN, T.RECORDID, T.TAXPRICE, T.TAXTOTALAMOUNT FROM QKJVIP_ORDER_ERPORDER T WHERE 1=1
AND T.NAME LIKE '%${params.name}%'
